text: 32:40 Aisaia 55:3; Jeremaia 31:31-33Egh kɨ me ko Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiam damuam. Eghtɨ Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir kam ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam. Kɨ kamaghɨn akam akɨrigh suam, Kɨ deragh me damuamin arazim ateghan kogham. Egh kɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim me danɨngam, eghtɨ me nan atiating nan apengan ikiam, egh me ua na ateghan kogham.
